answers.answer: yes i have had something similar to this Except mine is a sharp pain tightening my left side of my ribs/chest area and I do believe it is a heart condition I am not a doctor but It is passed through family of mine who have diabetes my father has a heart conditionand i was told to be careful with caffine/sugars/carbohydrates for these put major stress on your heart and cannot pump at its normal pace.

question: Does anyone get pain on their chest on the left side around the heart and the muscles tighten up, and you loose feeling in your left arm and left leg? and you cant breathe at times all at once? I need a doctor that will listen to help. If anyone has these problems please contact me.
title: left side chest pain, loosing feeling in left arm and leg, mucles tighting
